entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , North Perth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:17 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
